'''All Things Are of the Earth''' is [[Baizhu]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This buff is '''linear''' to Baizhu's Max HP and not stepwise at every 1,000 points of Max HP.
* The maximum increases to reaction DMG from this talent are:
** '''100%''' for Burning, Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon
** '''40%''' for Aggravate and Spread
* This bonus will still trigger when healing a character at full HP.
